channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 07:39 Driven anxiety in the Odesa region. Follow the subsequent messages.
item.description: 🟢 07:39 Driven anxiety in the Odesa region. Follow the subsequent messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

Consider that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk.
